sentences: Gary LeVox (born Gary Wayne Vernon Jr., July 10, 1970) is an American singer and songwriter.
LeVox was born in Powell, Ohio.
Prompted by his cousin, LeVox moved to Nashville, Tennessee, in 1997.
One day, when the regular guitarist was not available, Joe Don Rooney stepped in.
The band disbanded in 2020, after which LeVox began releasing solo music.
In May 2021, he released his first solo EP, One on One.

LeVox has been married to Tara Vernon since 1999.
